Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1979...
Injured on 8/5/1983 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 4/26/1984 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Coney Island on 7/8/1984 (Going to PIL: P J. Moon, SS E. Mcinerney. Going to CI: P G. Figuera, P A. Saad, P J. Zwick, P D. Kleiber)...
